name: com.realx.packagelibrary
description: A Unity Editor tool to manage, version, and share assets across projects using a shared library structure.

changes: Added import tracking system (RxImportStatus) to detect imported and outdated assets
UI now displays icons for imported and outdated versions without disrupting layout
Prevented exporting duplicate version files by checking for existing file
Refined asset card layout and icon placement
Added support for multiple named library paths
Library selection available in both Browse and New Asset tabs
Exporting assets now respects selected library path
Improved UI with thumbnails, grouped cards, and compact icons
Bug fixes for asset deletion and dynamic refresh
